name: Snow Child
description:
Originally created for Inkle's Pendragon campfire tales call.

It's originally based on a (somewhat inappropriate) joke that was said to be quite popular in the middle ages (I'll add references here as soon as I find the bloody book I read it in). Here I completely rewrite it in rhymes and in a context that would make sense in Pendragon.

Cover photo by Walid Amghar on Unsplash
